title: Looks like it but not exactly...
content:
A family member of mine is wanting to know what the typeface is called for a baseball teams logo. I "think" it's Shelley Script but its not exactly that close to Shelley Script.

Help would be gladly appreciated. Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017145015im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_NEW%20(800x618)_5364.jpg)
